column4: Is there any difference between a root shell opened with sudo su - on ubunu and logging in directly as root on another distro?
I am trying to use xcdroast, and it is complaining that there is a permissions error  preventing it from accessing files it needs, even when executed with higher priviledges.
I'm not in the mood to struggle with it, so if anybody knows of a burner that will "just work" I'm open to suggestions
